definition: to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
to shout/to call/to order/to ask/to be called/by (indicates agent in the passive mood)

sentences.english: This is clearly an Ajax call using the XHR object.
sentences.chinese: 这是个很典型的用XHR目标进行AJAX的呼叫。

sentences.english: Command, huang feng call third reconnaissance teams, have been slow to respond.
sentences.chinese: 司令部内，黄鸣锋呼叫第三侦察小队，迟迟没有回应。

sentences.english: I have a call from Kon Tou Tak yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天从桅杆头德有一次呼叫。

sentences.english: In the second section, the process of the Call-center project is described by stages.
sentences.chinese: 在第二节中分阶段讲述了呼叫中心项目实施的全过程。

sentences.english: Here is the call light. Push this button when you want help.
sentences.chinese: 这个是呼叫器，如果你需要帮助的话请按这个按纽。

sentences.english: Some of them that stood there, when they heard that, said, This man calleth for Elias.
sentences.chinese: 站在那里的人，有的听见就说，这个人呼叫以利亚呢。

sentences.english: You might accidentally open your mouth to yell and accidentally breathe in some water.
sentences.chinese: 你可能冷不丁地张嘴呼叫，吸进一些水。

sentences.english: I saw it before. I saw her in the Dial-a-Style.
sentences.chinese: 我以前见到过，在“呼叫时尚”。

sentences.english: Looking ahead, G telecom call center business opportunities and challenges.
sentences.chinese: 展望未来，G电信呼叫中心业务机遇与挑战并存。

sentences.english: Yes, could you put me through to Mr. Black in Room 619. please?
sentences.chinese: 是的，你通过呼叫到我619房间来吗？

sentences.english: The Zetas have told that contacts occur by means of the Call.
sentences.chinese: 齐塔人已经说过联系会依靠呼叫的方式进行。

sentences.english: Hai Nan pilot. M/T Pacific Spirit calling . Do you read me?
sentences.chinese: 海南引航员。“太平精神”轮呼叫。听到了吗？

sentences.english: This is the call button. If you need our help.
sentences.chinese: 这是呼叫钮，如果您需要我们做什么，只需按一下。

sentences.english: A cuckoo began calling from a hawthorn tree .
sentences.chinese: 一只布谷鸟开始在一株山楂树里咕咕地呼叫。

sentences.english: Futuregen has the instant call center solution for you.
sentences.chinese: 未来发电公司都为您即时呼叫中心解决方案。

sentences.english: And Ahimaaz called, and said unto the king, All is well.
sentences.chinese: 亚希玛斯向王呼叫说，平安了。

definition: to call out (a name etc)/to shout
